phrs.translation: 硬膜外血肿，硬脑膜外血肿

sentences.sentence: Some mothers choose to have an epidural when giving birth.
sentences.translation: 有的母亲分娩时选择硬膜外麻醉。

sentences.sentence: Will I need an epidural (and when can I have one)?
sentences.translation: 我需要硬膜外麻醉吗(或者什么时候才能得到麻醉)？

sentences.sentence: Even if you have an epidural, sitting, side lying, or rocking are options available to you.
sentences.translation: 即使你使用了硬膜外麻醉，坐，侧躺，摇晃都可以是你的选择。
